question.text: Which celebrity talk show host accidentally tweeted a glowing review of their Microsoft Surface tablet from their iPad?

data.title: What do you think of this 'GagaVille: Lady Gaga goes to FarmVille' commercial?

question.text: What do you think of this 'GagaVille: Lady Gaga goes to FarmVille' commercial?
After reviewing the 'Jersey Shore Yourself GTL' game, did you create a Jersery Shore version of yourself?

answers.text: Yes, I admit it... I 'Snookified' myself.
Yes, I might even have to show off my Guido/Guidette.
No, I started to create a character but stopped partially through.
No, I wouldn't touch this game.

question.text: Which Jersey Shore castmate helps guide you through this game?
Which celebrity admitted to having a major Farmville addiction?
Have you purchased any celebrity related games, expansions, virtual items or apps?

answers.text: I wouldn't admit it if I did.
